question.title: setOpenInBrowserButtonState(CustomTabsIntent.OPEN_IN_BROWSER_STATE_OFF) for CustomTabsIntent Not Working
question.body:
I am trying to open a webpage in a CustomTabsIntent and hide the "Open in Chrome" option which appears to be done in androidx.browser v1.9 or later.

This is the code

CustomTabsIntent.Builder intentBuilder = new CustomTabsIntent.Builder();
intentBuilder.setOpenInBrowserButtonState(CustomTabsIntent.OPEN_IN_BROWSER_STATE_OFF);

We have this annotation at the top of the method where the above code lives.

@OptIn(markerClass = ExperimentalOpenInBrowser.class)

My question is, do I have to add something to my Gradle file or compiler command line to "enforce" the opt in? The code is not hiding the "Open In Chrome" option in the custom tab.

Thanks

Rich
